name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snap-Desk: Capture ScreenShots as PDF Notes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful extension to capture screenshots of any desktop window or browser tab, Add text notes, and Save them as PDF files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly capture screenshots and save them as PDF files with our simple yet powerful extension. Experience unparalleled convenience and productivity as you take control of your screen.

ü§π Enhanced Multitasking with Picture-in-Picture Mode. 
  
Boost your productivity with our extension's rich multitasking capabilities. Utilize the Picture-in-Picture mode to effortlessly view and capture your screen from any other open window.

üôã‚Äç‚ôÇ Dedicated Help and Demo Site

To ensure you make the most of our extension's capabilities, we provide a dedicated walkthrough cum demo-site so you can learn to use it in a snap.


üìù Clean, Minimal, and Focused Design 

Our extension occupies less than 5% of your screen space, presenting only the essential buttons and functionality without hiding or disturbing your content. Enjoy a clutter-free interface designed for optimal user experience.


üö´ No Bloatware, No Extra Permissions 

Rest assured, we prioritize your privacy. Our extension only requires the necessary Desktop Capture Permission to take screenshots. We do not monitor your tabs or browsing history. Don't just take our word for it ‚Äì open your extension settings now, to see for yourself.


üö´ No Ads, No Redirects 
We've streamlined the entire process within the original page where the extension is used, eliminating any redirects to new pages or the need for additional applications. Enjoy a seamless and uninterrupted experience.

About Developer:
I am Tejas Jain, a passionate developer and a final year student at Delhi Technological University, New Delhi, India. I have developed this project with great enthusiasm and dedication to solve the problem of taking notes during meetings and online lectures, addressing the problem faced by myself and fellow students. 
Connect with me to explore more such exciting projects.
